creditline: Gift of Paul Maurer and Scott West
description: drawing on silver ground of nun and man wearing a vest seated at a table, with the man seated on a large mushroom; monkey dressed as priest, hippie with a God's Eye, man wearing skull cap, and a man wearing a large sandwich board of a two of clubs playing card; all figures are smoking; yellow, red, and white text at top; black ground; blue typewritten text at bottom

provenance: Paul Maurer, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2019.
title: South Side Sound System, The Phoenix, Freedom Highway, Avalon Ballroom, September 8-10, 1967
